/home/hhjo/KMHResearch/realsung/npm-Data.name: DOM text reinterpreted as HTML
/home/hhjo/KMHResearch/realsung/npm-Data.description: Reinterpreting text from the DOM as HTML can lead to a cross-site scripting vulnerability.
/home/hhjo/KMHResearch/realsung/npm-Data.message: [["DOM text"|"relative:///XssThroughDom.js:2:18:2:44"]] is reinterpreted as HTML without escaping meta-characters.
